step_feedback.feedback: Good job bringing your arms in front of your chest and making fists.  Inhale and tighten your muscles as instructed.
Excellent opening of your fingers and extending your arms horizontally. Remember to exhale and relax your muscles as you extend.
Try to maintain smoother arm movements and better muscle control during the horizontal extension. Focus on controlled exhalation.
The arm movements were a bit jerky; aim for smoother, more controlled horizontal pumping. Remember to coordinate your breathing with the movements.
While you completed the repetitions, focus on maintaining consistent muscle engagement and smoother transitions between arm positions.  Try to keep your movements more controlled.

exercise_summary: You performed the horizontal pumping exercise. Remember to coordinate your breathing with the arm movements, ensuring smooth transitions between the arm positions. Focus on controlled muscle engagement throughout each repetition.
